item.description:
"Cafe Allegre" and the landmark "Inn at Lafayette" ... combined to create an unforgettable and uniquely shoreline dining and lodging experience. Many years ago, in the small picturesque town of Madison, CT, the Inn at Lafayette, nestled on Main Street, began life as a church and meeting place. Today after extensive remodeling and refurbishing, a glorious new era has begun. Handwoven rugs, grand murals and faux textured walls create a dramatic backdrop for a "Historic" Dining experience
Let us Salute Chef SILVIO as he prepares us a delicious meal.

Owners Chris and Patrick Donahue pride themselves on providing a casual, friendly environment in which to enjoy great food and good times at the new Madison eatery Donahue’s. With a cozy, traditional décor and charming fireplace, Donahue’s encapsulates both dining and entertainment in one venue

Just when we think the night is over - it actually just begun as we dance the night away at Donahue's listening to one of our favorite bands Primetime.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Double Header" Cafe Allegre & Primetime at Donahue's
